page.title: 04Education Atlantic College
page.content: At Atlantic College there is a programme for extra mural activities. This programme has been organised to help young people who are handicapped and those who are at risk in the community.During 1984-5 efforts to make the social work teams in Mid Glamorgan familiar with Atlantic College were doubled.The Intermediate Treatment group took part in a four day sailing expedition from Falmouth. A donation from Allied Steel will enable ten similar projects to take place. David Jones who joined the staff in 1984 has organised a very successful residential youth training scheme for young people with hearing difficulties.There will be an International Deaf Youth Rally in 1985.Trainees have built a climbing wall at the pool for the handicapped.
